name: YEET (xardox, Tomasz Piasecki, sicoooo, MangosTasteLikeSoap)
description:
Fast paced local multiplayer brawler up to 4 players. Grow into objects to rotate with them or pull towards objects. Last one standing beetroot wins! Use explosives to blow some steam off. YEET other players out of the map

This Game was made during PolyJam 2023 which was Warsaw location of Global Game Jam 2023. The theme of the game jam was "Roots". We changed the title from "I Am Root" to "YEET".

Controls:
  • Left Stick/WSAD - Move 
  • Button Down/Space - Jump
  • Left trigger/ctrl - Root yourself to an object.
  • Right Trigger/shift - Pull (Yeet) yourself to an object.
Credits:
  • Jerzy Gab
  • Maja Kępczyńska
  • Tomasz Piasecki
  • Kaja K. Podżorska
  • Bartosz Sobczak

Both webgl and .exe builds are the same build as submitted to Global Game Jam. They have some physics related bugs. You have been warned.
